places.name: Tirana
places.description: Tirana is the capital and largest city of the Republic of Albania. Tirana is located in the center of Albania and is enclosed by mountains and hills.

places.name: Shkodër
places.description: Shkodër or Shkodra is one of the most ancient cities in the Balkans. The lake is the largest lake in Southern Europe close to the Adriatic Sea.

places.name: Gjirokastër
places.description: Gjirokastër is a city in southern Albania, an old town of UNESCO World Heritage Site, described as rare example of a well-preserved Ottoman town.

places.name: Sarandë
places.description: Sarandë, also simply Saranda, is a coastal town in Albania. Geographically, it is situated on an open sea gulf of the Ionian Sea in the central Mediterranean.

places.name: Gjipe
places.description: Gjipe is a bay and calcareous canyon located between Dhërmi and Vuno carved by the Ionian Sea in Vlorë County, Albania. You may climb there all day!

places.name: Tamarë
places.description: Tamarë is a settlement in the Shkodër County, northern Albania. You may hike there!

places.name: Himarë
places.description: Himarë is a part of Vlorë County. It lies between the Ceraunian Mountains and the Ionian Sea and is part of the Albanian Riviera.
